For each trade a 0.3% goes to liquidity: For each trade a 0.3% goes to liquidity providers.
The difference between the market price: The difference between the market price and your price due to trade size.
Your transaction will revert if the pric: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage
Your transaction will revert if there is: Your transaction will revert if there is a large, unfavorable price movement before it is confirmed.
Liquidity Provider Fee: 流动资金提供者手续费
Your transaction will revert if the pric: 如果兑换率变动超过此百分比，则将还原该交易。
Input is estimated. You will sell at mos: 输入数额仅为估值。您最多会售出{0} {1} 否则将还原交易。
Output is estimated. You will receive at: 输出数额仅为估值。您将收到至少 {0} {1} 代币，否则将还原交易。
Liquidity providers earn a 0.3% fee on a: 流动资金提供者在所有交易中按其在流动池中的份额获得0.3%的手续费。手续费按实时累计方式添加到流动池中，可与流动资金一起赎回。
<a>Tip:</a> When you add liquidity, you: 提示：当您注入流动资金时，您将收到代表您份额的流动池代币。这些代币将根据您在池中所占份额，自动赚取和累计相称的手续费，并且可以随时赎回流动池币对。
<a>Tip:</a> Removing pool tokens convert: 提示：退出资金池，按照当前汇率将您的资金池份额转换回原本代币。您收到的代币数额中将包含已累计的手续费。
